comment:
* TvContentRatingSystemInfo class provides information about a specific TV content rating system
 * defined either by a system app or by a third-party app.
 *
 * @hide

variables.name: CREATOR
variables.comment:
* Used to make this class parcelable.
     * @hide

methods.name: public static final TvContentRatingSystemInfo createTvContentRatingSystemInfo(int xmlResourceId, ApplicationInfo applicationInfo)
methods.comment: * Creates a TvContentRatingSystemInfo object with given resource ID and receiver info. * * @param xmlResourceId The ID of an XML resource whose root element is * <rating-system-definitions> * @param applicationInfo Information about the application that provides the TV content rating * system definition.

methods.name: public final boolean isSystemDefined()
methods.comment:
* Returns {@code true} if the TV content rating system is defined by a system app,
     * {@code false} otherwise.

methods.name: public final Uri getXmlUri()
methods.comment:
* Returns the URI to the XML resource that defines the TV content rating system.
     *
     * TODO: Remove. Instead, parse the XML resource and provide an interface to directly access
     * parsed information.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public static final TvContentRatingSystemInfo createTvContentRatingSystemInfo(int xmlResourceId, ApplicationInfo applicationInfo)
public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
